line: After squeezing through the tight passage I find myself in a still-small room, but at least I can stand up now.
I look around, and notice a skeleton in a corner. It's rather old, judging from appearance, and has no usable gear besides a slightly-rusted sword.

speaker: I
line: (Having something to defend myself with doesn't seem like a bad idea.)
As I pick up the sword, the skeleton suddenly jumps up!
